summary: Fixed version of Hybrid\'s work, no more invisible Daedric sword, no more floaty blood with the dagger
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=red]DISCLAIMER: This is NOT my work. Since Hybrid wrote on the mod page \"Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod, but please give credit.\" and many people asked for it, I simply fixed the bugs. Please give Hybrid due credit for his work. Gizmodian is the author of the original \"Vicious heart sword\".[/color]
[color=yellow]This does NOT include the texture files. So if you haven\'t downloaded Hybrid\'s mod, It won\'t work. Please follow the instructions below to install.
If you liked this please endorse! For easy endorsing visit your [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/history]Download history[/url]![/b][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6383][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21084-1-1343224381.jpg[/img]
Click here to go to the original mod[/center][/url]

[b][u]Installation[/u]:[/b]
This only fixes the non-replacer version.
Whether it be NMM or manual installation, download and install the original mod first ([color=yellow]REQUIRED[/color]), link is above.
Then download and install this one, [u]WITH Nexus Mod Manager do NOT choose \"Update\"[/u], overwrite when asked to.

----------------------------------

Fixed:
- Invisible Daedric sword in 1st person
- Floating blood when using the Dagger
- Fixed weapons mesh size (for use with Unlimited Bookshelves for example)

Not fixed:
- Glowing ball at the back of the head
[b][color=red]I have not been able to replicate that bug. If you experience it please contact me or leave a comment with details (what weapons, does this happen since you installed the mod, if not under what circumstances it happens, etc), or even better, if you know what\'s causing this![/color][/b]

----------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21092][center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21092-1-1343252645.png[/img]
[size=3]Those weapons are also available for SkyRe![/size][/center][/url]

----------------------------------

Credits:
Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh: Original mod
Gizmodian - Vicious heart sword mod Author
Yaushee aka Mastata: Bugfix

----------------------------------

[color=yellow]My other works:[/color]

> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21092]SkyRe - Compatibility Plugins for Weapons and Armor - Skyrim Redone[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20841]Quieter unsheathe/draw for Sword, Bound Sword and Dagger[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23321]Quieter Ice Spike and Icy Spear spells[/url]
author: Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh - Bugfix Yaushee aka Mastata
